entry.summary: Before you buy a product, a typical decision process may include comparison of similar products, browsing multiple brands, or consulting an expert(if you are lucky enough to know one). Recommendation systems are designed to simplify these convoluted process, like a personalized consultant only showing what you need. Since Amazon is the largest online retailer in the world, I became interested in how their website tailor personalized recommendations for enormous number of products and users.
